content: **this is a free pattern ** *i am obsessed with marled yarns so i had to design a hat using the technique what makes this yarn marled is by holding two strands of sweetgeorgia variegated yarn together the striping was a total surprise depending on where you start the ball or depending on the size you make the stripes many or may not emerge to me this is magical amelia bedelia hat is truly a quick knit and watching the colors marl stripe or pattern makes this an interesting knit * this pattern is also included in the 4-pattern booklet hats #2 a pdf & hardcopy combo can be purchased on thecraftyjackalope com 1 final blocked sizes circumference 19 /48 50cm 23 /58 50 25 /63 5cm height 10 5 /26 75cm 11 /28cm 11 5 /29 25cm **yarn** sweetgeorgia tough love sock 425 yards/388 meters fingering/sock weight x 1 skein sample shown in small size color cloudbreak *yarn held double throughout * **needles** 4 mm us6 16 /40 cm circular needles 5 mm us8 16 /40 cm circular needles 5 mm us8 dpns **notions** 1 stitch marker tapestry needle to weave in ends **gauge - blocked** st-st using 5mm us8 16 sts x 26 row = 4 /10 cm **measurements** circumference 19 /48 5 cm 23 /58 5 cm 25 /63 5 cm height 10 5 /26 75 cm 11 /28 cm 11 5 /29 25 cm 1 https //www thecraftyjackalope com/collections/booklets/products/hats-2-booklet
